name: Frank Thomas Big Hurt Baseball
description:
Frank Thomas Big Hurt Baseball is a simulation-sports game developed by Iguana Entertainment, Acclaim Studios Austin and Realtime Associates. It was originally released in 1995. It was published by Acclaim Entertainment. The game is rated as "Meh" on RAWG.
You can play Frank Thomas Big Hurt Baseball on SEGA Saturn, PlayStation, SNES and Game Boy.
It was produced by Dan Feinstein, Darrin Stubbington, Dave Semmens and David Dienstbier. Bey Bickerton, David Dienstbier and Jeff Spangenberg directed the game. It was scored by Darren Mitchell, Eric Swanson, Greg Turner and Marc Schaefgen.
